ai-ud4.3:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was wandering in the land of the Kosalans together with a large Saṅgha of mendicants.
ai-ud4.3:1.3_0: And then the Buddha left the road and went to the root of a certain tree.
ai-ud4.3:1.3_1: and after going, he sat down on the prepared seat.
ai-ud4.3:2.1_0: Then a certain cowherd went to the Fortunate One,
ai-ud4.3:2.2_0: The Buddha educated, encouraged, fired up, and inspired him with a Dhamma talk.
ai-ud4.3:3.1_0: Then the cowherd said to the Buddha,
ai-ud4.3:3.2_0: “Sir, may the Buddha together with the mendicant Saṅgha please accept tomorrow’s meal from me.”
ai-ud4.3:3.3_0: The Buddha consented by remaining silent.
ai-ud4.3:3.4_0: The cowherd got up from his seat, circumambulated the Buddha with his right side toward him, and left.
ai-ud4.3:4.1_0: And when the night had passed the cowherd had plenty of thick milk-rice prepared in his own home, with fresh ghee. Then he had the Buddha informed of the time, saying,
ai-ud4.3:5.1_0: The Buddha robed up, took his bowl and robe and, together with the Sangha of monks, went to the house of that cowherd.
ai-ud4.3:5.1_1: and after going, he sat down on the prepared seat.
ai-ud4.3:5.2_0: Then the cowherd served and satisfied the mendicant Saṅgha headed by the Buddha with his own hands with a thick milk-rice and fresh ghee.
ai-ud4.3:5.3_0: When the Buddha had eaten and washed his hand and bowl, that cowherd took a low seat and sat to one side.
ai-ud4.3:5.4_0: The Buddha then instructed, inspired, and gladdened him with a teaching, after which he got up and left.
ai-ud4.3:5.5_0: But soon after the Buddha had left, a certain man deprived that cowherd of life.
ai-ud4.3:6.1_0: Then many monks went to the Fortunate One,
ai-ud4.3:6.1_1: After bowing down to the Buddha, they sat down,
ai-ud4.3:6.3_0: “Sir, the Sangha of monks headed by the Buddha today on the fresh milk-rice and fresh ghee. The cowherd has flezing honey and suddenly.”
ai-ud4.3:7.1_0: Then, knowing the significance of this, on that occasion the Buddha expressed this heartfelt sentiment:
ai-ud4.3:8.3_0: than a hater to the hated,
ai-ud4.3:8.4_0: or an enemy to their foe.”
